data.title: Alumini – Anglo Sanskrit Victoria Jubilee Sr. Sec. School
data.text:
About Alumini Association

ASVJ School has an active alumni association. This is a registered organization under the Society’s registration act and every year alumni get-together “Sanskar” is organized every third Sunday of December by the alumni association.

The objective of the alumni association:

To develop a bond of love, sympathy and fellow feelings amongst the member of the fraternity to enable them to grow together.

To organize sports and other cultural activities for the alumni and their families.

To organize various competitions for the wards of alumni.

Old Luminaries

Harsh Vardhan- has his schooling from ASVJ. He did MBBS and MS with a specialization in ENT. He served as MLA and after that served as a cabinet minister in Govt. of India.

Deepak Chirimar- did his schooling from ASVJ after completing his graduation. He started his journey as an entrepreneur by starting a card punching system. His company handles data processing for census 2011.

Shri Ram- was passed in the 1900 batch. He was the founder of Commercial Sr. Sec. School, Shri Ram College of commerce and lady Shri Ram College.

Jugal Kishore- is from the 1889 batch, an educationist, one of the founders of the first girl’s school in Delhi, the Indraprastha Hindu Girls school and the first woman’s college of “ Indraprastha college for women”.

Current governing body

President : Mr Manoj Gaur

Secretary: Vinod Sharma

Treasurer: Umesh Varma
